title: Telecom Bill Saga | While the Bill is slated for discussion in the Rajya Sabha, a lot of you have reached out with questions and concerns over the bill. To address those we are organising a Briefing Call at 5 PM today, join us to ask questions, interact with experts and talk to the community.

# Briefing Call | Understanding the Telecom Bill, 2023 | 

**Dec 21, 5 PM IST** 

Register: [https://us06web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZcoduqrqT0iHdPyxXWlrxRezC0q5aoTRqLd](https://us06web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZcoduqrqT0iHdPyxXWlrxRezC0q5aoTRqLd)

Speakers: 

* Tejasi Panjiar, Associate Policy Counsel, IFF 
* Gayatri Malhotra, Associate Litigation Counsel, IFF 
* Meghna Bal, Head of Research Esya Centre 

​

Check out our first read: [https://internetfreedom.in/first-read-telecom-bill-2023/](https://internetfreedom.in/first-read-telecom-bill-2023/)

\-----------------------------------------------------
